name: WP Mouse Custom Cursor
author: Ninetyseven Infotech

sections.description:
Beautiful Mouse Cursor Ball Animation For Your Website

  • The PlugIn takes very low space in hosting
  • No need to edit settings or do something else
  • Only Plugin activation is enough to bring change for whole website

Live Preview

https://ninetyseveninfotech.in/wp-mouse-cursor

Looking for more styles?

  • Buy Pro with advanced features
  • This free version has only 5 style, but Pro version has 10+Style
  • Price is Affordable
  • No coding knowledge or expertise required! You will not have to use any short-code
sections.installation:
Download this free WordPress.org PlugIn, and

Step 1. Open your WordPress Admin Dashboard, click “Add New” in Plugins section
Step 2. Click on “Upload Plugin”
Step 3. Select the downloaded package, now click on “Install Now”
Step 4. Click on “Activate Plugin” to activate the PlugIn
Step 5. Go to Appearance -> Customize -> WP Mouse Custom Cursor -> Select Mouse Cursor Style -> Publish
Step 6. Refresh Your Fronted

Done! You have successfully installed the WordPress PlugIn. Now see the output in website live in browser.
